data.text:
Deputy Head of Chamber Music

Violinist Donald Grant studied at the RNCM with the late Christopher Rowland between 1998 and 2002, before returning for a two-year term as Junior Fellow in Chamber Music with the Elias String Quartet.

As a member of Elias Donald has performed in concert halls and festivals around the world, and has made many prize-winning recordings. The Quartet is now one of three RNCM Ensembles-in-Association alongside the Talich Quartet and Sitkovetsky Trio.
